previewArticle.title: New York Red Bulls vs. Montreal Impact | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: New York Red Bulls 4, Montreal Impact 2 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: The Red Bulls try to continue their climb up the Eastern Conference standings while the Impact continue to try and break their winless steak on the road.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: New York Red Bulls vs. Montreal Impact

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Zachary Diamond
timelineItems.text: Beautiful night for the soccer for the last game of the summer @yennafeldman @newyorkredbulls #rbny

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New York Red Bulls. Conceded by Hassoun Camara.

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: Three corners for NY inside the first 10 minutes. No lack of attack from the home side. #RBNY #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Andre Gagne
timelineItems.text: Oufff, j'avais souhaité bonne chance à Bush avant le match... Maintenant, je lui souhaite d'accorder moins de 4 buts... #imfc #nyrb

timelineItems.name: David Guevara
timelineItems.text: Out with the mrs enjoying #thebeautifulgame #RBNY http://t.co/tawQKYJ2WF

timelineItems.name: Sofiane Benzaza
timelineItems.text: Une victoire ce soir et Montréal est à 8 de NY et d'une place en séries. On vend du rêve ici #imfc #rbny

timelineItems.name: Julien Tessier
timelineItems.text: Mettez deux équipes défensivement inapte, mais très talentueuse à l'attaque et vous obtenez un matche excitant #IMFC #NYRB

timelineItems.name: Olivier Brett
timelineItems.text: On parle toujours de sa qualité et de son intelligence, mais Henry est aussi une bête sur le plan physique. Parlez-en a Lefèvre. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Mike Petke's Sweater
timelineItems.text: So we are playing a 1-1-8 today. What do you think of the new formation? #rbny

timelineItems.name: Mack Williams
timelineItems.text: Been far too long. Forza Metro! #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Jack McInerney (Montreal Impact).
Ibrahim Sekagya (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Frank Pavs
timelineItems.text: Getting some very good chances with Henry, Cahill and Wright-Phillips up top. I like this. Gotta turn these chances into goals though. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: ImpactSoccer.com
timelineItems.text: Piatti revient souvent dans l'axe alors que Duka passe à gauche #NYvMTL

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Chris Duvall (New York Red Bulls).
Dilly Duka (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt missed. Ignacio Piatti (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Calum Mallace.

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: We’re out of the opening 15’ interval, which is #RBNY’s worst for conceding goals (8 in 2014). #IMFC’s worst? 31’-45’ (10 goals conceded).

timelineItems.name: Mauricio Vincello
timelineItems.text: Sur les phases offensives, c'est plus facilement Mallace qui se projette vers l'avant que Felipe. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: De bons moments pour #IMFC quand on prend le temps de garder le ballon un peu #RDS #MLS

timelineItems.name: Matthias Van Halst
timelineItems.text: New York est une machine à poser son jeu et à centrer des 15 derniers mètres. Montréal peut-il l'enrayer ?#NYvMTL

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: Of note, #RBNY will be attacking the Southward in the first, not second half #NYvMTL

timelineItems.comment: Jack McInerney (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Dax McCarty (New York Red Bulls).

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: "Start spreading the news, we're winning today" reads the banner of the traveling #IMFC supporters here at RBA #NYvMTL #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New York Red Bulls. Conceded by Felipe Martins.

timelineItems.name: SoccerHerald.com
timelineItems.text: The pace at Red Bull Arena has slowed after a hellacious start by New York. #NYvMTL

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, New York Red Bulls 4, Montreal Impact 2.

timelineItems.name: Coach D
timelineItems.text: Thankfully this match has come to an end. #imfc #redbull #mls

timelineItems.name: Red Rider
timelineItems.text: What a game. These are the kind of nights where you're really pissed off that you couldn't go. #NYRB #MLS @mls #NYvMTL #

timelineItems.name: Roehl Sybing
timelineItems.text: BWP is one hat trick away from making the record chase really interesting. #RBNY #MLS

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: FT: Henry double + BWP brace lead #RBNY to 4-2 win over @impactmontreal. http://t.co/exxQGvqBTg #NYvMTL http://t.co/XxPvTX5T8h

timelineItems.name: Anna Cotton
timelineItems.text: #RBNY

timelineItems.desc: Bradley Wright-Phillips claims the Red Bulls all-time scoring record en route to a 4-2 victory over the visiting Montreal Impact.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: New York Red Bulls vs Montreal Impact | August 23rd, 2014

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Henry knocks in 2 & BWP sets #RBNY's all-time scoring record. Good day at the office: http://t.co/mvw2wZoZqk #NYvMTL http://t.co/7t256YV7xU

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Tim Cahill (New York Red Bulls) header from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Thierry Henry with a cross.
Corner,  New York Red Bulls. Conceded by Hassoun Camara.

timelineItems.name: Nate Sulat
timelineItems.text: No chance that's a penalty. Zero. Aucun. #NYvMTL

timelineItems.name: Matthias Van Halst
timelineItems.text: Felipe touche Miller mais prend très bien le ballon avant. Jamais de faute là-dessus #NYvMTL

timelineItems.name: Patrick MacDonald
timelineItems.text: Some fine acting by Miller there #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Dave Lévesque
timelineItems.text: Déjà 5 corners en un peu plus de 20 minutes pour les Red Bulls. #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Jack McInerney (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Ignacio Piatti.

timelineItems.name: Ultra Incognito
timelineItems.text: 5th corner.. Ouais.. Pas trop efficace. Ca sent le rope a dope. #fingerscrossed #IMFC #imfclive

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Thierry Henry (New York Red Bulls) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses the top left corner.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Thierry Henry’s shot goes just wide after a lovely fake

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: The Impact look frail defensively. What they don't look like is a team that just played in El Salvador on Wednesday. Very lively in attack.

timelineItems.name: Andre Gagne
timelineItems.text: +1000 “@Olivier_Brett: Piatti a un flair incroyable pour faire ces appels en profondeurs. Timing impeccable. #IMFC”

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Roy Miller (New York Red Bulls) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Dax McCarty.
Attempt missed. Thierry Henry (New York Red Bulls) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left.
Corner,  Montreal Impact. Conceded by Jamison Olave.
Foul by Tim Cahill (New York Red Bulls).
Calum Mallace (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Matthias Van Halst
timelineItems.text: Ce match #NYvMTL oppose deux équipes qui encaissent régulièrement sur des tirs de loin

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Andrés Romero (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: Stéphane Demers
timelineItems.text: On traverse les 20 min sans accordé de but, malgré 5 corners #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Mauricio Vincello
timelineItems.text: Ai-je vu un bon centre de Krol ? #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: This double stop to deny #RBNY is RIDICULOUS: http://t.co/J47LfAQJ3S #NYvMTL

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Calum Mallace (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Hassoun Camara.

timelineItems.name: L'Alternative Foot
timelineItems.text: Piatti fait un bien fou avec et sans ballon. #IMFC #NYvMTL #MLS

timelineItems.name: Ainslie Binder
timelineItems.text: .@TheRealBWP's "0.97 goals/90 minutes ration leads everyone in #MLS" via @BigAppleSoccer http://t.co/yeGqxZhsu9 #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Matthias Van Halst
timelineItems.text: Romero face à Miller, ça pourrait être une des clefs de la réussite de Montréal #NYvMTL

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Roy Miller (New York Red Bulls).
Andrés Romero (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: Thierry Henry has pulled up his shorts. It's on now. #RBNY #NYvMTL

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Roy Miller (New York Red Bulls).
Andrés Romero (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Dilly Duka (Montreal Impact).
Chris Duvall (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Matthias Van Halst
timelineItems.text: Je comprends pour Miller était le 3e choix du Costa Rica au poste de back gauche à la Coupe du monde #NYvMTL

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Montreal Impact. Andrés Romero tries a through ball, but Jack McInerney is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: AM7
timelineItems.text: Roy Millers itchin for a card #NYvMTL

timelineItems.name: Dave Lévesque
timelineItems.text: Je trouve JackMac un peu trop passif en ce moment. Il attend les ballons et ne s'implique pas assez à mon goût. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: Dax with two ridiculous tackles in a row to break up a Montreal counter. Crowd eats it up. #RBNY #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Jack McInerney (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Chris Duvall (New York Red Bulls).

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: Selon Klopas, les Red Bulls attaquent en grand nombre et il faut en tirer profit sur les contres #IMFC #MLS #RDS

timelineItems.name: Patrick MacDonald
timelineItems.text: Awesome d by McCarty there. Been missing that kind of play by him #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Dilly Duka (Montreal Impact).
Chris Duvall (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Bradley Wright-Phillips (New York Red Bulls).
Felipe Martins (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Calum Mallace (Montreal Impact).
Lloyd Sam (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: L'officiel a vu du sang sur la lèvre de Duka, donc demande un traitement. Pas grand chose de visible cependant #IMFC #MLS #RDS

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  New York Red Bulls 0, Montreal Impact 1. Dilly Duka (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from the center of the box to the bottom left corner
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Dilly Duka opens up the scoring for Montreal after a great long ball

timelineItems.name: GSharp
timelineItems.text: Both Bush and Perkins have two left feet! #IMFC #imfclive #tsn690

timelineItems.name: Nate Sulat
timelineItems.text: Duka just made that look easy. #RBNY pay dearly for their inability to convert their opportunities. #NYvMTL

timelineItems.name: Gerry Sacco
timelineItems.text: That's what happens when defense gets pushed too high... #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Dave Lévesque
timelineItems.text: Belle poussée de Duka pour son premier but avec #IMFC, mais aussi très belle longue passe de Mallace sur le jeu.

timelineItems.name: Pablo Maurer
timelineItems.text: Ridiculous ball there to spring Duka, phenomenal finish. #RBNY #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: I'm not sayin, I'm just sayin https://t.co/woEuvGpIv4 #NYvMTL

timelineItems.comment: Krzysztof Krol (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Lloyd Sam (New York Red Bulls).

timelineItems.name: Pablo Maurer
timelineItems.text: Has anybody made a joke about Piatti defecting to the Red Bulls yet? No? Ok, I just did then. #RBNY #IMFC #MLS

timelineItems.name: Ryan Brister
timelineItems.text: This is a no excuse game for #RBNY. Have to be able to beat #IMFC at home

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Dilly Duka (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Krzysztof Krol.
Attempt blocked. Lloyd Sam (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Attempt blocked. Calum Mallace (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: Raquel Moon
timelineItems.text: Cheering on our boys! @NewYorkRedBulls #DoWhatYouWant #runwithus #contest #RBNY http://t.co/VWsSHJBeL8

timelineItems.name: Olivier Brett
timelineItems.text: Felipe est en difficulté chaque fois qu'il reçoit le ballon de ses défenseurs en faisant dos au jeu. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Mack Williams
timelineItems.text: Thierry Henry is the only person who can give a more disappointed look than my parents. #rbny @NewYorkRedBulls

timelineItems.name: Billy Keenly
timelineItems.text: Robles is more dangerous for my heart than cholesterol #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Lloyd Sam (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Felipe Martins (Montreal Impact).
Corner,  New York Red Bulls. Conceded by Hassoun Camara.
Attempt missed. Dax McCarty (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Thierry Henry with a cross.
Hand ball by Bradley Wright-Phillips (New York Red Bulls).

timelineItems.name: NY Red Bulls WUFC
timelineItems.text: My friend says I should be more positive, but then the Red Bulld give up a soft goal. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Jonathan gervais
timelineItems.text: C'est fous comme l'opinion des gens peux changer en quelque seconde. Hop super passe de Mallace et ces soudainement un Héros. #Impact #IMFC

timelineItems.name: L'Alternative Foot
timelineItems.text: Sinon y'a un patron en défense centrale. On vous laisse deviner qui. #IMFC #NYvMTL #MLS

timelineItems.name: Mauricio Vincello
timelineItems.text: Olave et Sam, ils sont toujours en forme. #IMFC #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Montreal Impact. Krzysztof Krol tries a through ball, but Dilly Duka is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Dave Lévesque
timelineItems.text: Quelques petits soucis, sans plus. Solide demie de #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Mark Fishkin
timelineItems.text: #RBNY: Frustration and awfulness.

timelineItems.name: supporter
timelineItems.text: Boo #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, New York Red Bulls 0, Montreal Impact 1.

timelineItems.name: JS Bournival
timelineItems.text: Ferrari/Wandrille je vous fait un calin gros comme le ciel. quelle demie! #imfc

timelineItems.name: Upper 90 Soccer
timelineItems.text: HT: #RBNY started brightly but couldn't take their chances. #IMFC finished brightly, and Duka's strike has the visitors up 1-0 #NYvMTL

timelineItems.name: Patrick Leduc
timelineItems.text: Quand #IMFC punit l'adversaire pour ses chances manquées... Encore l'effet Piatti? #RBNY 0-1 #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins New York Red Bulls 0, Montreal Impact 1.

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: Both teams out of the locker rooms at the same time. No early return for NY a la the Revs game. #RBNY #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Felipe Martins (Montreal Impact).
Dax McCarty (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Arto
timelineItems.text: Go Red Bulls! #allinforred #runwithus #nyredbulls #nyrb #redbulls @lernat @coachtaraj

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: WATCH: Dilly Duka notches his first goal in an @impactmontreal uniform. http://t.co/Vpd1bRhrYV #NYvMTL

timelineItems.name: GSharp
timelineItems.text: If I was coaching #IMFC, I'd rather never see Felipe on my side of midfield! We may get shredded in d-mid this evening. #imfclive #tsn690

timelineItems.name: Eric Jonathan Martin
timelineItems.text: I like to think I'm pretty level-headed, but if the @NewYorkRedBulls don't win tonight, I might insult the entire city of Montréal. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: katia.olsen5
timelineItems.text: Red bull game!!!! #leggo #saturdaynightsoccer #rbny

timelineItems.desc: Bradley Wright-Phillips' (New York Red Bulls) shot from the left side of goal hits the goal post
timelineItems.title: MISS: Bradley Wright-Phillips’ header goes off the upright

timelineItems.name: Olivier Brett
timelineItems.text: Agréable de voir Henry qui salue l'intention de Olave même si ce dernier lui sert une très mauvaise passe. #Leadership

timelineItems.name: Lee Barcomb
timelineItems.text: I really like Bush's game, but he must be better with his distribution. Can't keep giving the ball away. #imfc

timelineItems.comment: Wandrille Lefevre (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Bradley Wright-Phillips (New York Red Bulls).
Attempt missed. Eric Alexander (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Thierry Henry.

timelineItems.name: Julien Tessier
timelineItems.text: Merci les poteau #IMFC

timelineItems.name: RBNYTweets (Matt)
timelineItems.text: Peguy & Oyongo only guys warming up. I assume they’re coming on around the 60′ but why not at halftime? This isn’t working. #RBNY

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  New York Red Bulls 1, Montreal Impact 1. Thierry Henry (New York Red Bulls) header from the center of the box to the bottom right corner
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Thierry Henry’s diving header finds the back of the net

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: It is hard to describe what BWP just did, but it didn’t result in a goal, so I won’t try. #RBNY #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Benjamin Falvo
timelineItems.text: Yo #Petke change the formation. Do something! #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Dave Lévesque
timelineItems.text: La chance serait-elle en train de tourner pour #IMFC?

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: 8e but en 5 duels pour Henry vs #IMFC #MLS #RDS 1-1

timelineItems.name: Jeff Moreira
timelineItems.text: Henry is still nasty #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Thierry Henry (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Matteo Ferrari (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: Janel
timelineItems.text: Please don't ever leave us. #Henry #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Offside, New York Red Bulls. Tim Cahill tries a through ball, but Bradley Wright-Phillips is caught offside.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Ignacio Piatti (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Ignacio Piatti’s shot goes wide left

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: Whenever this team leads a lift, the man does not fail. Providing moments of magic time and time again #RBNY #NYvMTL

timelineItems.name: Dave Lévesque
timelineItems.text: Cela dit, à la décharge de Wandou, l'exécution a été parfaite sur le jeu. #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New York Red Bulls. Conceded by Wandrille Lefevre.
Attempt missed. Ignacio Piatti (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Andrés Romero.

timelineItems.name: Alexi Lalas
timelineItems.text: Henry’s apparent distain for humanity after he scores is forever glorious. #NYvMTL

timelineItems.name: rguilbert
timelineItems.text: Boyz night!  #rbny #teammvp

timelineItems.name: Josh Gabriel
timelineItems.text: It's been a while. #RBNY #MLS

timelineItems.name: Mauricio Vincello
timelineItems.text: Dark look de Titi envers @wandrillelef. Gros duel ! #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Mise-o-jeu
timelineItems.text: Mallace, Felipe et Duka au milieu. J'ai peur #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Steve Hoffman
timelineItems.text: I Believe That We Will Win!!! #RBNY #OptimismRules #HomeCooking

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: BREAKING: Petke is wearing a sweater vest. #RBNY #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Frank Pavs
timelineItems.text: I still don't know what to think about picking up Sene, but we needed something to change. We're desperate for some help. Go RedBulls! #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Nick Sabetti
timelineItems.text: Impact have to play their way out of trouble here. Don't want to sit too deep. #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Lineups are announced and players are warming up.

timelineItems.name: Mac
timelineItems.text: We are making stupid sloppy mistakes, that's what time off does to you.... #RBNY #NYvMTL

timelineItems.desc: Attempt blocked. Tim Cahill (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from very close range is blocked.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Evan Bush and Matteo Ferrari make two huge back to back saves

timelineItems.name: Christian Mendonca
timelineItems.text: Henry is going to kill BWP one of these days if he keeps playing those terrible balls to him #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Lloyd Sam (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Felipe Martins (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: John Corbett
timelineItems.text: A group of kids ran over to yell at the #IMFC supporters when #TH14 scored. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: Had been waiting for Sekagya to do something worth tweeting about; he’s just nutmegged himself, which takes exquisite skill. #RBNY #IMFC

timelineItems.text: Oyongo on for Alexander in the 60th minute. I bet many fans will be happy with the timing of that sub. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: Entrée de Di Vaio sous peu #IMFC #RDS

timelineItems.name: Albert
timelineItems.text: If there's one positive to take out no matter what happens tonight is team spirit. Count the high fives given. You'll get there boys. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: Di Vaio on for Jack McInerney... the Italian always seems to pop up in the right spots for #IMFC #NYvMTL

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Bradley Wright-Phillips (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Lloyd Sam.

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: You know Oyongo is from Cameroon when you see him rocking long sleeves on a 70-degree night in Harrison. #NotQuiteColdWeatherYet

timelineItems.text: Andres Romero leads the league in "What's he think he's up to?" per 90. #NYvMTL

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: Tissot va entrer #IMFC #RDS

timelineItems.name: Olivier Tremblay
timelineItems.text: Thierry Henry wins at life.

timelineItems.name: Jordan Mabe
timelineItems.text: View from 101 #RBNY #RunWithUs

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Tim Cahill (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from very close range is blocked.

timelineItems.name: L'Alternative Foot
timelineItems.text: La curiosité du match c'est la paire Felipe/Mallace. #IMFC #NYvMTL

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New York Red Bulls. Conceded by Andrés Romero.

timelineItems.name: Effie
timelineItems.text: Thierry Henry is something n'est-ce pas? Evan Bush should have stopped that one though..... #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Steve Ramirez
timelineItems.text: I'm a better left back than Krol, and i'm not even a lefty...and Bush should do better on Henry shot #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: Comment peut-on donner autant de temps à Henry ? #IMFC #RDS

timelineItems.name: Alek Avendaño
timelineItems.text: Tant qu'à faire, @ThierryHenry , vient jouer avec nous. On va t'aimer, à la folie. On va tout te pardonner. Tout. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: g lalla
timelineItems.text: Golazzo! Henry scoring twice as nice #RBNY #runwithus #southward

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: Henry STARING DOWN Camara on throw-ins from close range. It is the damnedest thing. #RBNY #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Stephy L.
timelineItems.text: 2-1. Can you dig it? So far, I can. Gotta seal 3pts! #RBNY

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Marco Di Vaio (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Felip
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Luis Robles stuffs DiVaio

timelineItems.name: bill gordon
timelineItems.text: Montreal showcasing what has them in last place. Gifting the go-ahead goal to the #RBNY. Without Henry, Different team would be last.

timelineItems.name: Nick Sabetti
timelineItems.text: Almost 20% of Thierry Henry's goals in @MLS have come against the Montreal Impact. 9/48 #NYRB #IMFC #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Marco Di Vaio (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Felipe Martins with a through ball.

timelineItems.name: maj2122
timelineItems.text: Some people are really into the #NewYorkRedBulls #nojoke #nofilter

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Felipe Martins (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Marco Di Vaio.

timelineItems.name: Olivier Morneau
timelineItems.text: Il se passe quoi avec Issey? Blessé? #IMFC

timelineItems.name: L'Alternative Foot
timelineItems.text: Dayum Robles !! #IMFC #NYvMTL #MLS

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  New York Red Bulls 3, Montreal Impact 1. Bradley Wright-Phillips (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from the center of the box to the
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Bradley Wright-Phillips ties Angel for the Red Bulls goal scoring record

timelineItems.comment: Offside, New York Red Bulls. Thierry Henry tries a through ball, but Péguy Luyindula is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Chris Julien
timelineItems.text: Don't how #TFC fans can't respect @ThierryHenry. The man has it out for the #Impact every time the #RBNY play them. 2 goals again from him

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: GOAL BWP, FROM HENRY - JPA’S RECORD HAS BEEN MATCHED! #RBNY #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: Jackson-Hamel va entrer #IMFC #RDS

timelineItems.name: Patrick MacDonald
timelineItems.text: This is what the team has always been capable of #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Simon Goulet
timelineItems.text: Next time match de la #LDC concacaf on joue au stade olympique! Titi ne veux pas jouer sur une surface synthetique #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Christian Mendonca
timelineItems.text: BWP tieing up JPA for all-time regular season goals by #Metro #RBNY. Very nice, I like.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: BWP, No. 19. #NYvMTL http://t.co/4Ju1G0SFgH

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Thierry Henry (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from more than 35 yards is just a bit too high. Assisted by Ambroise Oyongo Bitolo.

timelineItems.name: Section 126
timelineItems.text: Let this be a lesson for the #ChampionsLeague. #RBNY 3 #IMFC 1 75' #IMFClive

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: Tidy finish from BWP, but it's just another one of those nights where Henry just can do no wrong (these often happen against #IMFC) #NYvMTL

timelineItems.name: L'Alternative Foot
timelineItems.text: C'était 2-2 y'a une minute (Di Vaio vs Robles). Et voilà 3-1 via le meilleur buteur de la ligue Wright-Phillips. #IMFC #NYvMTL #MLS

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  New York Red Bulls 3, Montreal Impact 2. Andres Romero (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from outside the box to the top left corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Andres Romero curls one into the top right corner

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New York Red Bulls. Conceded by Matteo Ferrari.

timelineItems.name: Sofiane Benzaza
timelineItems.text: Durant Sa Carrière, Henry a marqué plein de buts et c'est encore plus facile contre des mauvaises équipes #fact #imfc #rbny #NYvMTL

timelineItems.name: Samantha E.
timelineItems.text: How did no one kick that ball in?! #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Bradley Wright-Phillips (New York Red Bulls) header from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Thierry Henry with a cross.
Corner,  New York Red Bulls. Conceded by Wandrille Lefevre.

timelineItems.name: Dave Lévesque
timelineItems.text: Ça c'est le genre de jeu qui était un but contre #IMFC il n'y a pas si longtemps. Même chose pour le corner.

timelineItems.name: Oli
timelineItems.text: Ce n'est pas fini pour #imfc... 3-2! Assez pour créer un doute dans la tête du #RedBullNYC pour #ccl

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Thierry Henry (New York Red Bulls) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Dax McCarty.

timelineItems.name: Isaac
timelineItems.text: This game is about to get in-sene! #RBNY #first

timelineItems.name: Sofiane Benzaza
timelineItems.text: c'est la soirée des comeback kids Tissot Jackson-Hamel Romero #ibelievethatwewillwin #imfc #rbny #NYvMTL

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: Henry sera remplacé par Saer Sene #IMFC #RDS

timelineItems.name: Kathleen O.
timelineItems.text: If Henry gets another goal I might have to jump off the Jackson St Bridge, what w/ the not making him my fantasy captain this week. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: Sene for Henry. Bit of a gamble to take off best player with game still up for grabs, but Henry deserves a break. #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Péguy Luyindula (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Marco Di Vaio (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Thierry Henry? Yeah, he's still got it: http://t.co/i7LSljceiL #NYvMTL

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: Tonight's announced attendance is 17,891. #RBNY #IMFC #NYvMTL

timelineItems.name: Tomek Moczerniuk
timelineItems.text: Titi is done for the night. Gets a standing ovation and sits on a bench while nursing his hamstring. Saer Sene is his replacement. #NYvMTL

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Bradley Wright-Phillips (New York Red Bulls) header from the left side of the six yard box is close, but misses the top left corner. Assisted by Péguy Luyindula with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Carlos Figueiredo
timelineItems.text: At the very least, Saër Sène ups the Red Bulls' awesome hair factor. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Patrick MacDonald
timelineItems.text: Henry trending in NY #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Gerald Laing, Jr.
timelineItems.text: Ok folks, don't worry about the subway ride, get to Red Bull Arena and see Thierry Henry before it's too late. #RBNY @NewYorkRedBulls

timelineItems.name: Solomon
timelineItems.text: Watching The Red Bulls play Montreal Impact with my friend Alex visiting from Montreal. He bought a Red Bull Jersey. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Stéphane Demers
timelineItems.text: Romero semble brûlé maintenant , mais garde le sur le terrain et sort le Fantôme Felipe #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Montreal Impact. Hassoun Camara tries a through ball, but Anthony Jackson-Hamel is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Sofiane Benzaza
timelineItems.text: Tout ce qui manque à ce match est une remontada menée par @HassCamara6 : slalom de 50 mètres, centre &bcoup de ciseau de Jackson #imfc

timelineItems.name: Christian Araos
timelineItems.text: Meanwhile #RBNY look good for like five goals tonight. #NYvMTL

timelineItems.name: Olivier Brett
timelineItems.text: On posait la question mercredi et elle est encore plus pertinente ce soir: A-t-on vu les dernières mins de Perkins dans un maillot de #IMFC?

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  New York Red Bulls 4, Montreal Impact 2. Bradley Wright-Phillips (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from the center of the box to the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Bradley Wright-Phillips claims the Red Bull scoring record with his 2nd of the game

timelineItems.name: JPhilippe Brouillard
timelineItems.text: Felipe... #IMFC

timelineItems.name: RedCardWeekly™
timelineItems.text: Romero can be so bad for so long within a match. Then he curls one in? Very strange player #IMFC #MLS

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: GOAL BWP! The record is his, the dagger is in, good night, sweet Klopas. #RBNY #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Matthias Van Halst
timelineItems.text: Wright-Phillips met fin au suspense dans les arrêts de jeu : 4-2 #NYvMTL

timelineItems.name: Josh Gabriel
timelineItems.text: #BWP. The ultimate scoring machine. #RBNY #NYvsMTL

timelineItems.text: Cumulatif du score en 3 visites à NY pour #IMFC 5-15 #RDS

timelineItems.text: And that's the record for BWP! 20 in a season as he ties then surpasses JPA in the same game #RBNY #NYvMTL

timelineItems.name: Kamal Hylton
timelineItems.text: I can see #RBNY cashing in on Bradley Wright-Phillips after this season. Scoring 20 goals in any league will get you offers. #MLS

timelineItems.text: Your looking at a blurry picture of a record breaker. #rbny #runwithus
